response.answer_text: I think general consensus would be Where the Streets Have No Name. Here's the signature song, in my opinion, for each era (album trilogy) — Boy-War: Sunday Bloody Sunday. Runner-up: I Will Follow Unforgettable Fire-Rattle&Hum: WTSHNN. Runner-up: Pride Actung-Pop: One. Runner-up: Mysterious Ways ATYCLB-NLOTH: Beautiful Day. Runner-up: Vertigo Innocence/Experience: Every Breaking Wave. Runner-up: Miracle
